resources.string: Enter text from a sign near you to check whether you are in the right part of the station. Try to avoid mistakes when typing, and spell everything exactly as it is written on the sign!

Choose your starting point and end destination by clicking the buttons below and entering an address into each prompt. Once the route has been found, click GET THERE to be on the way to your destination.
Maps are clickable! When viewing a map from the Maps menu or during navigation, the small orange icons are buttons representing signs. Click one to see that sign\'s text.

Enter a Start and End location in the Maps Menu. After you click "GET THERE", look through the navigation steps. If you need help you can click a step to check a station map, verify with text entry, or verify by taking a photo of a sign.
